description: Try our easy to follow Chunky Beef & Mushroom Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chunky Beef & Mushroom Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 475 g tub Woolworths Classic Potato Mash

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a 20cm pie dish. Roll out pastry until 3mm thick. Ease into dish and trim excess. Prick base with a fork. Line with paper and fill with dried beans. Bake for 15 minutes. Remove paper and beans. Bake for a further 10 minutes. Transfer beef mixture to pie shell. Top with mash. Bake for 30 minutes until golden. Serve.

Remove paper and beans. Bake for a further 10 minutes. Transfer beef mixture to pie shell. Top with mash. Bake for 30 minutes until golden. Serve.
